snippet: “Janeites” (a k a Jane Austen fans) of all stripes united for lectures and dances over the weekend.
abstract: Annual three-day gathering of the Jane Austen Society of North America in Downtown Brooklyn brings over 700 Jane Austen fans, or Janeites as they call themselves, for author-related lectures and dances.
lead_paragraph: “Janeites” (a k a Jane Austen fans) of all stripes united for lectures and dances over the weekend.

headline.seo: Jane Austen Society of North America Meets in Brooklyn
headline.main: Lots of Pride, a Little Prejudice
headline.print_headline: Lots of Pride, a Little Prejudice
